news.content:
ü¶∏ From Zero to Hero: Deploying a VM on TF Grid 3


Thanks to Weynand for this great demo where he attempts to go from ‚Äúzero‚Äù (nothing installed) to deploying a Virtual Machine on TF Grid 3 in under 10 minutes!


For the technical audience, you‚Äôll be able to understand why this is so cool ‚Äì and for those who need some more explaining, not a problem ‚Äì we‚Äôve included info on Virtual Machines and some of the benefits of deploying them on the ThreeFold Grid.


If you‚Äôd like to get started yourself, please visit this section of our manual.
news.excerpt: Deploying a Virtual Machine on TF Grid 3 in under 10 minutes!

next.title: Why ThreeFold chose Stellar
next.excerpt: At ThreeFold, together with a beautiful ecosystem of partners, we are co-creating a peer-to-peer Internet that empowers equality, freedom, and sustainability.
